articles.title: Covid Live Updates: Omicron News, Vaccines and More - The New York Times
articles.description: The new Omicron variant was already in Europe a week ago, officials said, a week before the W.H.O. labeled it a “variant of concern.” Scientists are still unsure where or when Omicron originated.
